Header.docs: ドキュメンテーション

Banner.heading: Automate recurring salary payments in crypto!
Banner.description: Automate salary txs, streaming them by the second so employees can withdraw whenever they want and you don't have to deal with sending txs manually.

OnboardWalletConnect.footer: ウォレットを接続するだけでお金が移れません
OnboardWalletConnect.description: Create streams of indefinite duration and just siphon money out of a pool, which makes it possible to top all streams up in a single operation and just provide money as it's needed to maintain them.
OnboardWalletConnect.learnMore: ドキュメンテーションでもっと学ぶ
